translations: n.（君王的）宝座，御座；王位，王权，帝位（the throne）；（幽默）厕所；座天使（thrones）
vt.<文>使登上王位（或宝座、御座），使掌握王权
【名】 （Throne）（瑞典）特罗内，（英）特罗恩（人名）

sentences.sentence: Her duty was to produce an heir to the throne.
sentences.translation: 她的任务就是生育王位继承人。

sentences.sentence: She was forced to abdicate the throne of Spain.
sentences.translation: 她被迫让出西班牙的王位。

sentences.sentence: The country acknowledged his claim to the throne.
sentences.translation: 这个国家承认了他继承王位的权利。
